name: Scissors, Paper and Rock'n'Roll
description:
A rhythm game of rock, paper scissors. Headsmash your way through 2 pumping songs and 4 levels of increasing challenge.

Can you complete the final level, and prove that you rock in every sense of the word?

A,S,D to switch character

Directional arrows to aim

This game was made by one developer and one artist in 7 days for the Weekly Game Jam.

Music: (licensed under Creative Commons Attribution License)
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/XTaKeRuX
"Destructing Own Kingdom"
"Free Will Possession"

Many thanks to XTaKeRuX for making such great music freely available to creators.
